_header: Fair ladies I pray you tell me
_description: A riddle on family relationships — seven lines

WestmSch3.Transcription:
ffayr laydis I pray yow tillmeWhos this ij Fayre cheldren beSir
                    the cheldren of owr chelder be thayAnd we be moders of them twynall
                    bourn in wedlouck as I yow sayAnd to owr housbondis thay be breder
                    playnAnd yche to vther vncle sertayne
WestmSch3.Note:
In a sixteenth-century hand on the verso of the last folio of the
                    primary text.
WestmSch3.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             “An Unpublished Late Middle English Poem.” 
             Notes and Queries
         n.s. 12 [210] (1965): 327-8: 328.
